objarg.name: model path
objarg.digest: Absolute path to the pretrained model
objarg.description: Absolute path to the pretrained model.

objarg.name: method
objarg.digest: Name of the method to call during synthesis
objarg.description: Name of the method to call during synthesis.

objarg.name: buffer size
objarg.digest: Size of the internal buffer (can't be lower than the method's ratio)
objarg.description: Size of the internal buffer (can't be lower than the method's ratio).

method.name: delete
method.digest: delete a model downloaded from IRCAM Forum API
method.description: delete a model downloaded from IRCAM Forum API

method.name: method
method.digest: set the current method of model
method.description: set the current method of model

method.name: download
method.digest: download a model from IRCAM Forum API
method.description: download a model from IRCAM Forum API

attribute.name: track_buffers
attribute.digest: tracks buffer change for buffer attributes
attribute.description: tracks buffer change for buffer attributes

attribute.name: gpu
attribute.digest: Enable / disable gpu usage when available
attribute.description: Enable / disable gpu usage when available
